english.segment1: Feeling like a ghost in this town. Try to save my place, my head down. trudging on, moving keeps me warm
english.segment2: I thought loneliness would beat fear. but they make friends and bring them all here. satisfied, they won't leave tonight
english.segment3: everyone gets over this. they move along, they take some risks. all i want comes easily to everyone surrounding me
english.segment4: You say I won't be blamed again now. You promise me. I try to cover all the bases. I try but I could not succeed. It's on your face, nothing fell in place
english.segment5: Oh, I'm just trying to let you know. I could never see it your way. I could never let go. Oh, I could never let go
